name: entertainment-node-app
description: This entertainment-node-app is a Language Interpretation and Recognition Interface, or LIRI for short.  LIRI's main function is to take specific perameter for simple entertainment-related search requests and return relevant results.  Feed LIRI a movie title, band/ artist name, song title, or Tweet request and she will provide you with more details regarding these queries.  LIRI will also keep a log of abreviated results from her searches.
